import React from 'react'; import { Player } from 'components'; import { MenuLayout } from 'layouts'; import { Strings } from './strings'; import './styles.css'; import HomePage from 'pages/HomePage'; import { IonPage, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonTitle, IonButtons, IonContent, IonImg, IonText, } from '@ionic/react'; import { IconArrowLeft, logoAvatares, logoRealizadores, logoCamaraDeputados, logoLavid, logoUfpb, logoRnp, logoInstagram, logoFacebook, logoYoutube, } from 'assets'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router'; function Home() { const history = useHistory(); return ( {Strings.TOOLBAR_TITLE} history.goBack()}>

{Strings.CHARACTERS_TEXT_VLIBRAS}

{Strings.TEXT_VLIBRAS}

); } export default Home;
